concept.title: 5209.570 Limitations on contractors acting as lead system integrators.

conbody.p: 5219.202-1 Encouraging small business participation in acquisitions..

(c)(2) Submit the required written determination for approval with a copy of the approved AS, STRAP, or MOPAS-S by the SECDEF/USD(AT&L) via DASN(P) by email at https://psctool.us with the subject “[Activity Name] DFARS 209.570-2 - D&F to Use a Contractor to Perform Lead System Integrator Functions.”
